gameDetails.description:
The Tablet* mit App card is a special promo card for Le Havre: Le Grand Hameau. The card has the number GH33.

This card is included in the 2017 edition of Le Havre.

Description of the card:
Change 8 Money to 10 Money (limited to three times per turn)
